description: Bringing sexy back, in the form of a stretch lace racerback that begs to be bared. Let it peek out from under a wide neck, draped top, or an open back t-shirt. The front closure locks up to provide a secure fit,  and the thin stretch foam pads enhance your natural shape.

description: The cutest way to be comfy, this soft-to-the-touch bralette boasts subtle underbust ruching to maximize the modal cups. A wide lace band holds everything in place,   and lace trim around the edges frames a flattering silhouette that is sweet, without feeling saccharine.

description: This uber-on-trend lace racerback style will instantly turn tops with challenging necklines into style staples. product_name: b.tempt'd Faithfully Yours Strapless Underwire Bra
description: Who says practical can’t be pretty? Not us. Case in point- this beloved bestseller. Yeah, it does the work- supporting and lifting sans straps. And with a floral contrast trim and bow details, it looks damn good on the job.

description: Whether your OOTD calls for a halter, v-neck, crisscross or strapless situation, this has you covered. And concealed, thanks to strategically placed silicone on each contour cup. description: Up the flirt factor of those effortlessly sexy t-shirts in an instant.  Stretch foam pads, topped with shimmering opalescent fabric, provide contouring and coverage. description: Bringing sexy back, in the form of a stretch lace racerback that begs to be bared. Let it peek out from under a wide neck, draped top, or an open back t-shirt. The front closure locks up to provide a secure fit,  and the thin stretch foam pads enhance your natural shape.

product_name: b.provocative Front Close Wire Free Bralette
description: This uber-on-trend lace racerback style will instantly turn tops with challenging necklines into style staples. The fashion forward elongated triangle cups create a sexy V along the décolletage, anchored by an easy-to-fasten  front clasp. From any angle, this bralette provokes a lingering eye…

description: Up the flirt factor of those effortlessly sexy t-shirts in an instant.  Stretch foam pads, topped with shimmering opalescent fabric, provide contouring and coverage. Lace details frame the cups, and the lace band that stretches  around the body is lined for comfort. Just like your favorite t-shirt, you are gonna want to live in this bra- trust us.
style_attributes: [• Unlined underwire bra• 3-section cups with flat darted seam that virtually disappears under clothes  • Dramatic appliqued lace is lined with nude stretch opalescent fabric• Pretty elastic edge detail at top of cups• Nude opalescent band • Low plunge center• Fully adjustable straps• Matching panties 943222, 945222(sold separately), Body: 77% Nylon/ 23% Spandex ,Hand wash warm,Wash colors separately,Use non-chlorine bleach only when needed,Hang to dry,Do not iron,Do not dry clean]

description: Delivering both full-fledged sexy AND all-out comfy, this boyshort does not make compromises. And that is why we love it so. The style will lure you in with lace, and keep you captivated with its foolproof fit.

description: Delectable? Yes. Detectable? Nope. This moderate coverage thong disappears under clothes- so you can sport a seamless view from behind.  And, with a wide lace band along the waist that stays flat under clothes,  you can play coy about whether you are wearing anything at all if you so please.

description: Cute and clever, this is the ideal layering piece for every wardrobe. Held in place by medical grade silicone, you can go about your entire day- and night- with coverage confidence. Designed to be noticed,  the stretch lace back is an accessory unto itself.
style_attributes: [Strapless wire free bandeau bra,Two-ply seamless cups of novelty pique fabric,Molded cups for great shape without padding,Stretch fold over hem finish at cup top for optimum fit,Silicone along neckline keeps the bra in place,Soft eyelet inspired lace band and back,Lace band increases with XL size to maximize fit and comfort,Matching pant 945232(sold separately), Top Front: 41% Nylon/ 39% Polyester/ 20% Spandex; Bottom Front and Back: 87% Nylon / 13% Spandex ,Hand wash warm,Wash colors separately,Use non-chlorine bleach only when needed,Hang to dry,Do not iron,Do not dry clean]

description: The cutest way to be comfy, this soft-to-the-touch bralette boasts subtle underbust ruching to maximize the modal cups. A wide lace band holds everything in place,   and lace trim around the edges frames a flattering silhouette that is sweet, without feeling saccharine.
